REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0771 reute b f BC-MARINE-<MCRP.O>-GETS 06-29 0070

TEXT.TITLE: MARINE <MCRP.O> GETS MARSHALL/ILSLEY PROPOSAL
TEXT.BODY: Marine Corp said it received a proposal from Marshall and Ilsley Corp <MRIS.O> under which Marine shareholders would receive Marshall and Ilsley common stock or a combination of cash and stock equal to at least 62.50 dlrs a share of Marine common. It said the proposal will be considered by the Marine board after analysis by its advisers. Reuter
